intro: Psychotria lineata, commonly known as the red-eyed wonder, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of Central and South America. The plant is characterized by its striking red flowers, which are often surrounded by dark green foliage. Psychotria lineata is typically found in humid, shaded environments such as rainforests. It has small, elliptical leaves and produces small, fleshy berries that are an important food source for various wildlife species.
